verses.verse: Now <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H8141>years;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, You are <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H8141>years,<s%> and there <S%H7604>remains<s%> yet <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to be <S%H3423>possessed.<s%>
<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> that yet <S%H7604>remains:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1552>borders<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1651>Geshuri,<s%>

From <S%H7883>Sihor,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even to the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> which is <S%H2803>counted<s%> to the <S%H3669>Canaanite:<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> the <S%H5841>Gazathites,<s%> and the <S%H796>Ashdothites,<s%> the <S%H832>Eshkalonites,<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittites,<s%> and the <S%H6139>Ekronites;<s%> also the <S%H5757>Avites:<s%>

From the <S%H8486>south,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and <S%H4632>Mearah<s%> that is beside the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek,<s%> to the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites:<s%>

And the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1382>Giblites,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> toward the sun <S%H4217>rise,<s%> <S%H8121><s%> from <S%H1171>Baalgad<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> to the <S%H935>entering<s%> into <S%H2574>Hamath.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country from <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> to <S%H4956>Misrephothmaim,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> them will I <S%H3423>drive<s%> out from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H5307>divide<s%> you it by lot to the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%>

With <S%H5973>whom<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them, <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward,<s%> even as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them;

From <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> that is on the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>river,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4334>plain<s%> of <S%H4311>Medeba<s%> to <S%H1769>Dibon;<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%>

And <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and <S%H4602>Maachathites,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> to <S%H5548>Salcah;<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and in <S%H154>Edrei,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> <S%H7604>remained<s%> of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7497>giants:<s%> for these did <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5221>smite,<s%> and <S%H3423>cast<s%> them out.

Nevertheless the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3423>expelled<s%> not the <S%H1651>Geshurites,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> the <S%H4602>Maachathites:<s%> but the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and the <S%H4602>Maachathites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H7535>Only<s%> to the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> the sacrifices of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> made by fire are their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as he <S%H1696>said<s%> to them.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> inheritance according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And their <S%H1366>coast<s%> was from <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> that is <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>river,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4334>plain<s%> by <S%H4311>Medeba;<s%>
<S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are in the <S%H4334>plain;<s%> <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> and <S%H1120>Bamothbaal,<s%> and <S%H1010>Bethbaalmeon,<s%>
And <S%H3096>Jahaza,<s%> and <S%H6932>Kedemoth,<s%> and <S%H4158>Mephaath,<s%>
And <S%H7156>Kirjathaim,<s%> and <S%H7643>Sibmah,<s%> and <S%H6890>Zarethshahar<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley,<s%>
And <S%H1047>Bethpeor,<s%> and <S%H798>Ashdothpisgah,<s%> <S%H6449><s%> and <S%H1020>Bethjeshimoth,<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4334>plain,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> with the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H189>Evi,<s%> and <S%H7552>Rekem,<s%> and <S%H6698>Zur,<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> and <S%H7254>Reba,<s%> which were <S%H5257>dukes<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> in the <S%H776>country.<s%>

<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor,<s%> the <S%H7080>soothsayer,<s%> did the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2026>slay<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H413>among<s%> them that were <S%H2491>slain<s%> by them.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> was <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> thereof. <S%H2063>This<s%> was the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and the <S%H2691>villages<s%> thereof.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> inheritance to the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> even to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And their <S%H1366>coast<s%> was <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> to <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> that is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah;<s%>
And from <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> to <S%H7434>Ramathmizpeh,<s%> and <S%H993>Betonim;<s%> and from <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir;<s%>

And in the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> <S%H1027>Betharam,<s%> and <S%H1039>Bethnimrah,<s%> and <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and <S%H6829>Zaphon,<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> and his <S%H1366>border,<s%> even to the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinnereth<s%> on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward.<s%>
<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> inheritance to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> and this was the possession of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> by their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And their <S%H1366>coast<s%> was from <S%H4266>Mahanaim,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2333>towns<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> three <S%H8346>score<s%> <S%H5892>cities:<s%>

And <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H6252>Ashtaroth,<s%> and <S%H154>Edrei,<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> were pertaining to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> even to the one <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> by their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the countries <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> did <S%H5157>distribute<s%> for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> by <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H4217>eastward.<s%>

But to the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> not <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as he <S%H1696>said<s%> to them.
